name: Super Rooftop Chopper Fighter
description:
In a world controlled by oppressive AI-controlled Cybercopters, one man climbs to the rooftops, ready to make a final stand against the choppers for the sake of all humanity.

  • Story mode (about 20 minutes long)
  • Endless survival mode with additional types of enemies
  • 10 different usable weapons
  • Leaderboards for Story and Survival modes (accessed from main menu)
  • Over 150 bits of voiced dialogue
  • Plenty of explosions

Made in one month, February 2013. It's a short-ish, simple game!
